reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked at this hotel when we couldn't book at the local Best Western (which turned out to be full of fellow Porsche owners who were on a club journey) and we were pleasantly surprised. All the facilities were modern, the room was small but functional, the staff were very helpful. Breakfast was a typical Accor Hotels breakfast.
reviews.title: A surprisingly nice hotel

reviews.text: I use this hotel for my business trips to Provence and it is a good match between price and services.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, good prices

reviews.text: They have an internal restaurant with a simple but good menu and a full breakfast service, rooms furniture are modern, simple but functional.
reviews.title: Good deal and very clean, nicely design Hotel

reviews.text: There are also a couple of nice restaurants nearby for a night outing.
reviews.title: Good location for exploring Provence

reviews.text: Easy connection to Aix en Provence by motorway (entrance nearby the hotel), the hotel lies in a quiet country place in the north of Aix, 15 min by motorway.
reviews.title: Just another IBIS
